parameters.command: apt update -qq 2>/dev/null; PENDING=$(apt list --upgradable 2>/dev/null | tail -n +2 | wc -l); REBOOT=$(cat /var/run/reboot-required 2>/dev/null && echo 'yes' || echo 'no'); echo "apt|plex|${PENDING}|${REBOOT}"

apt update -qq 2>/dev/null; PENDING=$(apt list --upgradable 2>/dev/null | tail -n +2 | wc -l); REBOOT=$(cat /var/run/reboot-required 2>/dev/null && echo 'yes' || echo 'no'); echo "apt|arr|${PENDING}|${REBOOT}"

apt update -qq 2>/dev/null; PENDING=$(apt list --upgradable 2>/dev/null | tail -n +2 | wc -l); REBOOT=$(cat /var/run/reboot-required 2>/dev/null && echo 'yes' || echo 'no'); echo "apt|cadre|${PENDING}|${REBOOT}"

apt update -qq 2>/dev/null; PENDING=$(apt list --upgradable 2>/dev/null | tail -n +2 | wc -l); REBOOT=$(cat /var/run/reboot-required 2>/dev/null && echo 'yes' || echo 'no'); echo "apt|ns|${PENDING}|${REBOOT}"

apt update -qq 2>/dev/null; PENDING=$(apt list --upgradable 2>/dev/null | tail -n +2 | wc -l); REBOOT=$(cat /var/run/reboot-required 2>/dev/null && echo 'yes' || echo 'no'); echo "apt|utilities|${PENDING}|${REBOOT}"

apt update -qq 2>/dev/null; PENDING=$(apt list --upgradable 2>/dev/null | tail -n +2 | wc -l); REBOOT=$(cat /var/run/reboot-required 2>/dev/null && echo 'yes' || echo 'no'); echo "apt|iot|${PENDING}|${REBOOT}"

apt update -qq 2>/dev/null; PENDING=$(apt list --upgradable 2>/dev/null | tail -n +2 | wc -l); REBOOT=$(cat /var/run/reboot-required 2>/dev/null && echo 'yes' || echo 'no'); echo "apt|ha|${PENDING}|${REBOOT}"

for c in sonarr radarr prowlarr overseerr sabnzbd tautulli; do ver=$(docker inspect "$c" 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].Config.Labels["org.opencontainers.image.version"] // "unknown"'); echo "docker|$c|$ver"; done

ver=$(docker inspect traefik 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].Config.Labels["org.opencontainers.image.version"] // "unknown"'); echo "docker|traefik|$ver"; z2m_ver=$(docker exec zigbee2mqtt-office cat /app/package.json 2>/dev/null | jq -r ".version" 2>/dev/null || echo "unknown"); echo "docker|zigbee2mqtt|$z2m_ver"

docker ps -a --format json 2>/dev/null | jq -r 'select(.State == "restarting" or (.Status | test("unhealthy"))) | "health|\(.Names)|\(.State)|\(.Status)"'
CIDS=$(docker ps -aq 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$CIDS" ] && docker inspect $CIDS 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[] | select(.RestartCount > 3) | "restarts|\(.Name | ltrimstr("/"))|\(.RestartCount)"' || true
echo "healthcheck|done"

docker ps -a --format json 2>/dev/null | jq -r 'select(.State == "restarting" or (.Status | test("unhealthy"))) | "health|\(.Names)|\(.State)|\(.Status)"'
CIDS=$(docker ps -aq 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$CIDS" ] && docker inspect $CIDS 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[] | select(.RestartCount > 3) | "restarts|\(.Name | ltrimstr("/"))|\(.RestartCount)"' || true
echo "healthcheck|done"

docker ps -a --format json 2>/dev/null | jq -r 'select(.State == "restarting" or (.Status | test("unhealthy"))) | "health|\(.Names)|\(.State)|\(.Status)"'
CIDS=$(docker ps -aq 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$CIDS" ] && docker inspect $CIDS 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[] | select(.RestartCount > 3) | "restarts|\(.Name | ltrimstr("/"))|\(.RestartCount)"' || true
echo "healthcheck|done"

docker ps -a --format json 2>/dev/null | jq -r 'select(.State == "restarting" or (.Status | test("unhealthy"))) | "health|\(.Names)|\(.State)|\(.Status)"'
CIDS=$(docker ps -aq 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$CIDS" ] && docker inspect $CIDS 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[] | select(.RestartCount > 3) | "restarts|\(.Name | ltrimstr("/"))|\(.RestartCount)"' || true
echo "healthcheck|done"

docker ps -a --format json 2>/dev/null | jq -r 'select(.State == "restarting" or (.Status | test("unhealthy"))) | "health|\(.Names)|\(.State)|\(.Status)"'
CIDS=$(docker ps -aq 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$CIDS" ] && docker inspect $CIDS 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[] | select(.RestartCount > 3) | "restarts|\(.Name | ltrimstr("/"))|\(.RestartCount)"' || true
echo "healthcheck|done"

docker exec dockhand sqlite3 -separator '|' /app/data/db/dockhand.db "SELECT 'stack', stack_name, sync_status, COALESCE(sync_error, '') FROM git_stacks" 2>/dev/null || echo "stack|ERROR|query_failed|"
docker exec dockhand sqlite3 -separator '|' /app/data/db/dockhand.db "SELECT 'exec_fail', gs.stack_name, se.status, COALESCE(se.error_message, '') FROM schedule_executions se JOIN git_stacks gs ON se.git_stack_id = gs.id WHERE se.status = 'failed' AND se.triggered_at > datetime('now', '-7 days') ORDER BY se.triggered_at DESC LIMIT 10" 2>/dev/null
echo "dockhand|done"
